X53_README:
Parameter: cL, cR
100% decay to Wt

The cross sections and decay width here are for cL = 1. 
The production cross sections are different depending of the associated quark.
To use an alternative parameter use:

GamTot[c'] = GamWt_quad*(c'^2) 

Sigma[c']= Sigma_quad*(c'^2)

Where c = cL OR c = cR 

The parameter cL should be O[1]-O[10].
To use cL < 2 assures narrow width (GamTot[cL']/MT <~ 10%)
T23_B13_doublet_README:
Parameter: cR (only rigth-handed, one unique coupling for the doublet)

The cross sections and decay widths here are for cR = 1. 
The production cross sections are different depending of the associated quark.
To use an alternative parameter use:

GamTot_T[cR'](GeV) = GamTot_T(GeV)*cR'^2
GamTot_B[cR'](GeV) = GamTot_B(GeV)*cR'^2

Sigma[cR'](pp>Btj) = Sigma(pp>Btj)*cR'^2
Sigma[cR'](pp>Ttj) = Sigma(pp>Ttj)*cR'^2

The parameter cL should be O[1]-O[10].
To use cR < 2 assures narrow width (GamTot[cR']/MT <~ 10%)
Y43_README:
Parameter: cL, cR
100% decay to Wb

The cross sections and decay width here are for cL = 1. 
The production cross sections are different depending of the associated quark.
To use an alternative parameter use:

GamTot[c'] = GamWt_quad*(c'^2) 

Sigma[c']= Sigma_quad*(c'^2)

Where c = cL OR c = cR 

The parameter cL should be O[1]-O[10].
To use cL < 2 assures narrow width (GamTot[cL']/MT <~ 10%)
B13_singlet_README:
(missing to calculate production trougth BZb)
Parameter: cL (only left-handed)

The cross sections and decay width here are for cL = 1. 
The production cross sections are different depending of the associated quark.
To use an alternative parameter use:

GamTot[cL'](GeV) = GamTot(GeV)*cL'^2

Sigma[cL'](pp>TVQ_b)(fb)= Sigma(pp>TVQ_b)(fb)*cL'^2
Sigma[cL'](pp>TVQ_t)(fb)= Sigma(pp>TVQ_t)(fb)*cL'^2

The parameter cL should be O[1]-O[10].
README.md:
# Cross_sections_VLQ

Repository with cross sections and parameters recipe to different benchmarks of single and double VLQ LHC production.
Reference: http://arxiv.org/pdf/1409.0100.pdf

For Double production cross sections please refer to https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/B2GMonteCarlo
T23singlet_README:
Parameter: cL (only left-handed)

The cross sections and decay width here are for cL = 1. 
The production cross sections are different depending of the associated quark.
To use an alternative parameter use:

GamTot[cL'](GeV) = GamTot(GeV)*cL'^2

Sigma[cL'](pp>TVQ_b)(fb)= Sigma(pp>TVQ_b)(fb)*cL'^2
Sigma[cL'](pp>TVQ_t)(fb)= Sigma(pp>TVQ_t)(fb)*cL'^2

The parameter cL should be O[1]-O[10].
To use cL < 2 assures narrow width (GamTot[cL']/MT <~ 10%)
